name: gulp-cli

scripts.lint: jshint lib index.js --reporter node_modules/jshint-stylish/stylish.js --exclude node_modules && jscs --esnext index.js lib bin test
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
